name: 十字防守(X Defense: Timing TD)
name_original: 十字防守(X Defense: Timing TD)
description:
If you are a big fan of strategy or tower defense games, you won't want to miss this novel strategy tower defense game. This game will bring you something new that you will never experience in other tower defense games.
"X Defense: Timing TD" is built upon randomness, and you need to find the right strategy to defeat this randomness. You will have a lot of fun with this process.

Novel tower defense experience.


Turret building and merging are random.



You can upgrade your turrets by race.

Unleash bosses to get more game resources. You are in control of when and which boss to unleash.



Upgrade turrets need energy balls. You can activate and upgrade Energy ball generators to collect energy balls.

Powerful special skills


Top-tier turrets (SS) may have powerful special skills, which can help you defend more waves. You can obtain and combine the usage of different skills, and there are infinite possibilities.



Give this game a try, and you will have a novel gaming experience! Download the game now and start your game adventure!
